job_tasks.phrase: improve solutions like Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to improving existing AI solutions, which involves working with and potentially modifying the underlying models.

job_tasks.phrase: maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows by automating the data and ml processes used within the team
job_tasks.justification: Automating data and ML processes to improve workflows is a software development task, ensuring the smooth operation and enhancement of AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: maintain and innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and innovating tooling for conversational bots and IVR points to software development and integration efforts.

job_tasks.phrase: maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our conversational solutions
job_tasks.justification: This directly implies working with and improving the models that power the conversational solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows
job_tasks.justification: Setting up a data architecture is a core data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating LLM prompts is a task related to understanding and optimizing the behavior of generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating classification algorithms is a direct modeling task, assessing performance and effectiveness.

job_tasks.phrase: design how we store and manually annotate data
job_tasks.justification: Designing data storage and annotation processes falls under data engineering and preparation.
Empowering solutions with LLMs involves leveraging and potentially fine-tuning these models.

job_tasks.phrase: massive migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot
job_tasks.justification: Migrating platforms and integrating new tools like MS Copilot involves significant software development and integration work.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants.
In the extended team (~50 colleagues) you will be working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers.
shape the future of Conversational AI
meet evolving customer needs and industry standards
innovate on top of our conversational bot
enhancing, and innovating our conversational solutions

classification.rationale: The role strongly emphasizes working with LLMs, conversational AI, chatbots, and IVRs, aligning with the core focus of a GenAI Engineer. The explicit mention of 'empower our solutions with LLMs' and migration to 'MS Copilot' solidifies this classification, alongside tasks like evaluating LLM prompts and building around generative AI capabilities.
